Items.Title: Application No. C 160313 ZSM submitted by SJC 33 Owner 2015 LLC pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for the grant of a special permit pursuant to Sections 13-45 and 13-451 of the Zoning Resolution to allow an attended accessory parking garage with a maximum capacity of 164 spaces on portions of the ground floor and cellar of a proposed mixed use development (South Site), on property located at 550 Washington Street (Block 596, Lot 1), Borough of Manhattan, Community Board 2, Council District 3.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Laid Over by Subcommittee
Items.MatterName: Zoning, 550 Washinton Street/Special Hudson River Park District, Manhattan (C160313ZSM)

Items.MinutesNote: Other Council Members Attending: Greenfield and Johnson
